item.title: Train AI models with Unsloth and Hugging Face Jobs for FREE
item.description: This blog post covers how to use Unsloth and Hugging Face Jobs for fast LLM fine-tuning (specifically LiquidAI/LFM2.5-1.2B-Instruct ) through coding agents like Claude Code and Codex. Unsloth provides ~2x faster training and ~60% less VRAM usage compared to standard methods, so training small models
item.author: Unknown
